text: Showbiz is the first album by the British alternative rock band Muse. ==Songs== #Sunburn #Muscle Museum #Fillip #Falling Down #Cave #Showbiz #Unintended #Uno #Sober #Escape #Overdue #Hate This and I'll Love You #Spiral Static ==References== Category:1999 albums Category:Muse albums Category:Debut albums Category:Rock albums
